title: Microsoft Xbox 360 Wired Controller Drivers for WinXP-32 bit
description:
These are the actual drivers to for the wired Xbox 360 controller. This will allow it to work on your PC running Windows XP.

My previous upload only contained an extension of the drivers, which is why it wouldn't work.

So here it is. Just run the executable and install it. Sorry about my last upload.


Sincerely, Arg_the_pirate

**No Malware Certified**

This torrent uses IPv6. :)


P.S.: You wouldn't believe how hard this was to find. Microsoft obviously doesn't want to support XP anymore, so the download is hidden away deep within their database! I had to find the link on a tech forum.

Will be doing the same thing for Windows XP 64 Bit Edition. I just have to find it now...

Okay, it has become very hard to find the drivers for Windows XP x64. I will not stop looking, though. And if you find it, please, if you would so kindly give me the link or host it yourself. We are in this together, people.

Thank you.
